name: Colorspace
description:
A short and simple first person puzzle platformer where you swap the colors of your environment to change physical space. Use Keys to make you're way through 5 levels!

Built in under 72 hours using Unity, Photoshop, and FL Studio.

Controls

  •  Movement - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Pick Up/Place - E
  • Swap Color - Left Mouse
  • Reset to Neutral - Right Mouse
